name: Chakra Desiderata
description:
After your other characters use Elemental Bursts: Gain 1 Resolve. (Max 3)
When the character to which this is attached uses Secret Art: Musou Shinsetsu: Consume all Resolve and deal +1 DMG per Resolve.
